body.name: Cuisinart TOB-60NFR Toaster Oven Broiler with Convection , Silver(Renewed)
features: Stainless steel and industrial style design with 1500 watts capability and 500 DegreeF temperature range
Precise toast shade dial, tinted glass oven door, 0.6 cu. feet
Nonstick coating covers the interior to make cleaning easy and quick
Includes: Baking tray, broiling rack, instruction/recipe booklet
body.description: The Cuisinart Toaster Oven Broiler with Convection sports a modern design and offers convenient versatility to meet your everyday meal prep needs. With bake, broil, toast and keep warm options in addition to convection bake and broil, you can cook up a storm for breakfast, lunch or supper. Its 0.6 cu.ft capacity means you can fit a 12" pizza or 6 slices of bread at the same time and monitor the progress through the tinted glass door. Small yet powerful, this 500°F countertop machine features precise toast shade control, non-stick interior for simple clean up, slide-out crumb tray and convenient Power-On LED indicator. BPA free parts.SpecificationsPower 1800 WattsDimensions (L x W x H): 19.10" x 15.50" x 9.80"Weight: 18.00lbCapacity: 0.6-cubic-footFunctions: Bake, broil, toast, convection bake, convection broil and warm

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Toaster You Need
reviews.reviewText: I use this Cuisinart item almost daily. I've had many basic toasters, a couple toaster ovens like this one (different brand name) and it's hard to beat this one! The convection option is an added bonus. It has performed flawlessly for a month now and I look forward to using t for years. I was shopping at a local mall last weekend, stopped by Crate & Barrel and they had the same item for sale for $129.99. I had to smile at the fact I got it delivered to my door for much less, thanks Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this toaster
reviews.reviewText: I bought this toaster oven to replace my last one (same brand different model) that kept turning itself on without being asked to.I love this model! It has a lovely little ding when it’s done and it evenly toasts, warms, and cooks to my heart’s delight! When my last one of this model died it had lasted for 5 years. It just got old and blew an element! This one was also a much better price than before. Thank you CuisinArt for making this great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Refurbished item works great
reviews.reviewText: The product I received was the same as a new one as far as I could tell. Works great. I'm happy with it and an even happier that I got it at a lower price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars So far so good . Died soon . Do not buy this junk
reviews.reviewText: .Do NOT buy this piece of crap. Used to make toast 2 times a week and died already .Trips circuit breaker when turned on . Amazon says other people have same issue but Cuisinart can tell me how to fix it . Horse crap I am not here to repair an item . I paid for it I want to use it. Cuisinart support is not there for my support so I 'll trash this junk and go to Wal Mart from now on .Me fix it . what is wrong with that picture . Fix my damn money back in my pocket !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: I bought this refurbished item trying to be frugal. It was a mistake. The controls are kludjy, toast is either overdone or underdone, it doesn’t indicate when it’s preheated. Can’t return it so I guess it goes to charity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice toaster oven
reviews.reviewText: Great toaster oven eat a great price.Only down side is cleaning it but that is what you see with most toaster ovens.We even used it to help cook for Thanksgiving. Worked great for yams and green bean casserole.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: 6 months of only using a couple times a week and the timer stopped working and almost started a fire in my kitchen. This is one of those products that looks nice but is poorly built.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Why did I wait so long?!
reviews.reviewText: I have been wanting a toaster/convection oven for a while. I found this one and decided to just buy it. Boy am I glad I did! It’s so nice. Works great. Looks good in my kitchen. Good size. Five stars for sure.
Muy buen funcionamiento llego todo en perfectas condiciones si lo recomiendo
